gobblin.kafka.writer

Class KafkaDataWriter<D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.instrumented.writer.InstrumentedDataWriter<D>
      • gobblin.kafka.writer.KafkaDataWriter<D>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instrumentable, FinalState, DataWriter<D>, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class KafkaDataWriter<D>
extends InstrumentedDataWriter<D>
    Implementation of KafkaWriter that wraps a KafkaProducer. This does not provide transactional / exactly-once semantics. Applications should expect data to be possibly written to Kafka even if the overall Gobblin job fails.
